assessments.status_rationale: Today’s items include reporting that Trump floated “new tariffs” related to Greenland, but nothing indicates a formal U.S. tariff duty-rate increase (>= +10pp) specifically targeting exports to China of a named AI accelerator model via Federal Register/USTR/CBP guidance. No qualifying action is evidenced.
No news bullet references Taiwan or a Taiwan state-linked entity publishing a binding U.S. semiconductor investment commitment >=$25B with a named U.S. site/state.

A news item notes U.S. lawmakers meeting with Denmark’s prime minister on Greenland, but there is no public announcement or conduct of a Greenland-based NATO military exercise involving at least three NATO member states.

While there is reporting on Iran protests and crackdowns, nothing cited indicates a new nationwide policy explicitly criminalizing unauthorized satellite internet access that names “Starlink” in an official law/regulation/directive.
No bullet indicates Goldman Sachs publicly announced direct involvement in prediction markets (partnership enabling client access, investment/acquisition, or market-making on a regulated platform).
No news bullet references Wikimedia Foundation budget/annual plan documents or projected revenue from AI/data/content licensing at or above $25M.

Nothing in today’s bullets indicates the FDA opened a formal public process (docket/RFI/ANPRM/draft guidance) addressing safety assessment of a BPA-replacement chemical (e.g., BPS/BPF) in food-contact materials.

This is a calendar-year 2026 wildfire acreage outcome; today’s news provides no Alaska Interagency Coordination Center (AICC) final season statistics or NIFC year-end summary establishing whether 2026 acres burned exceed 1.5 million.
No bullet mentions TSMC revising 2026 capex guidance, nor a comparison against the midpoint provided in its Q4 2025 earnings release/call.

No item indicates FHFA initiated a structured public consultation on ending conservatorship or privatization/IPO pathways for Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac via an RFI, proposed framework, or equivalent official document.
